View your loot tracker data.

## /loot view

**Usage**

- `/loot view name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to view. | - |

## /loot reset

**Usage**

- `/loot reset name:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to reset. | - |

**Examples**

- `/loot view name:Nex`
